text: Skills location: .kg/skills/<name>/SKILL.md — accessible as .claude/skills/ via the .claude→.kg symlink. Claude Code discovers them automatically.

/note skill [kg-stop-hook]: Phase 1 sync — kg create notes-YYYY-MM-DD + kg add [HH:MM] text --type note, report bullet ID. Phase 2 async — Task(Explore) does kg search + kg context, updates bullet with [slug] cross-refs if relevant.
/notes skill: lists daily notes nodes (notes-YYYY-MM-DD). Filters: empty=today, date, yesterday, week/7d, all, or search query. Uses kg nodes 'notes-*' + kg show.
